website_summaries.verdict: This newest eufy model is also its most powerful, and includes boundary strips for cleaning smaller areas.
pros: The 1,500 Pa vacuum power is the strongest offered by eufy to date
includes the popular BoostIQ technology available on other eufy units, along with impressive 100 min
This model also comes equipped with the ability to set boundary strips, which tell the vacuum to stay confined to a specific area rather than cleaning an entire room
cons: As with other compact models, filter cleaning may be required after each room in order to maintain suction power

customer_reviews.title: For the entry level pet hair remover...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is *super* nice and worth it. It's not as expensive as others, but that's perfect for what it comes with (no app or some mapping). First couple cleaning out it's covered 1500 sq ft, with several overlapping paths. Update #1 Eufy/Anker Customer Service is outstanding. They replied to this review and answered some questions along with offering above and beyond service. Kudos. This thing has run daily with some amazing results. I can't actually believe what its picking up. Update #2 Dec 2nd 2019 This vacuum lasted around 7 months before a noise happened internally. Couldn't fix it. Replaced with Deebots.
customer_reviews.author: Razor Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Got it this last weekend and am surprised how much dust and dog hair it picks up. Works great on hardwood and does a good job on those few low profile carpets we have. I run it daily in different parts of the house and need to empty out the dust bin daily - but then we have three dogs. If it were only dust and just some human hair that would probably not be necessary. Does a great job! Quickly found out where it gets stuck and put up the boundary tape there. Still looking for the ideal place to locate it permanently, will probably end up under a sofa end table in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: TheToal

customer_reviews.title: Best $'s I've spent in a long time. Runs at 2am every night. Fire and forget.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - 9 months in still going strong haven't replaced a single part. Best purchase ever. We have a small place with a lot of stuff and a new dog. My biggest concerns where noise and this robot getting stuck. After one or two mishaps where the robot found cables I forgot about, the robot has now run perfectly at 2am each morning for 5 days straight and always finds its way back. Checkout the video where this thing navigates through our bicycles - I never even clean there! :) Super diligent little robot!
customer_reviews.author: Rudolfmdlt

customer_reviews.title: It releases dust and pet hair back on the floor
customer_reviews.text: This product does not pick up pet hair well, what is worse is that whenever it goes on a slightly higher surface than the hardwood floor, such as carpet, it releases lots of dust and hair back onto the floor for some reason. I have been using it for 1 month and had to clean up after it!! I should have returned it sooner for a refund, now had to stuck with it. I was using Roomba before and it worked much better in picking up hair and dust. It was rather noisy and the brush sucked in too much hair and hard to remove. Decided to give Eufy a try but its clearly a bad decision.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is basically an expensive, circular, pile of garbage. Since receipt it has not work correctly. It doesn't start when you hit START, it doesn't run on it's programmed schedule, it doesn't avoid the magnet strips send with it, even when placed exactly as instructed. Buy a different vacuum because this one is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny F

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not know what to make of this but it seems to do it's job. In the video you can see how it effortlessly goes on and off rugs. It does go around fixed items well. It did get stuck on a corner of my rug that is a bit bent at the corner. And it does find it's way back home with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little helper
customer_reviews.text: We just love this! It's our first one so we didn't go for the most expensive, but after the amazing job it did on day one we'll be getting a second one soon for the upstairs. I'm a clean person but wow every single day the amount of dust, hair and grossness it picks up amazes me in a crazy way! I'm so happy we got this and don't know why I ever waited so long. Do it, you'll be really happy you did. My photos are from day one. Oh and it's sleek and low profile allows it to easily clean under the couch, coffee table and everywhere. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Eufy was very easy to put together and use. Good direction book-I have not had the need to call customer service. Picks up hair, dust balls, cat liter. Goes into corners. Easily block area with magazine basket or books etc. -have not had to use the strips. Was a little tricky for the cleaning-filter compartment opens From the top and bottom. The inner portion of the rotating wheel is the only section that comes out-I used a small screwdriver, because I couldn’t hold it and pull it out. I have NO complaints. Would recommend buying this product 100%. Also had a $30 off coupon, which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last! *update - seller was great at helping address!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only owned it for a month and a half and it already broke down. It starts spinning in circles for no reason then turns itself off. Sadly just after return window. It was a nice unit when it ran but I don’t recommend taking the chance. Wish I hadn’t. Even though it’s still under warranty, having problems so soon has made me really lose faith in this brand. Update: the seller eufyome was great about working with me and helping me solve this situation to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Strong Little Robot
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly strong sucking power on this little machine. It can deep clean the carpets pretty well. Only issues come about when it gets caught on things like fan bases or if it just flings objects like kitty litter or food around rather than picking it up. However, if you give it time it eventually picks it up. That being said, it does an impressive job at picking up cat and human hair. Only downside is having to clean the brush all the time but that's true about.... well... any vacuum. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tayhlia

customer_reviews.title: Wondering
customer_reviews.text: I'm wondering how there are so many good reviews for this. I found it to be very useless. First, I set it right in front of a small patch of loose dirt that a normal vacuum would suck right up. This just went over the top and kept going. Left 90% of it on the low pile carpet. I have a square room that should be no problem for a robot. There is one shelf in the corner and this guy kept going under the same shelf over and over and over and really didn't clean anything else. Never came back to the dirt that I wanted picked up. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and support. Only lasted a little over a yr of use. Died the infamous 4-beep-death
customer_reviews.text: It did an ok job cleaning but died just past the warranty. It developed the infamous 4 beep death. The main motor gave up. I contacted support and their answer was sorry you're out of warranty but we do have a very limited stock of motors available if you hurry and paypal us $30 we can ship it to you right away. For something I paid $240 (back then) out the door to only last a little over a yr with casual use. The motor probably costs $2. No thanks. Staying away from Anker and Eufy for good.
customer_reviews.author: Stioc

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Requires babysitting.
customer_reviews.text: A 12 year old could program a robot just as well or better. This thing bounces around the house without any rhyme or reason. It has no method and just randomly picks a direction or angle, often just going over the same spot many times and missing important areas. It doesn't seem to even obey the magnetic strips that came with it. You have to babysit this thing to make it cover your rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Happy w my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Eufy offers excellent customer service from start to finish! I spent weeks researching robot vacs & I’m very happy w my choice. Navigates furniture & rugs well... as long as you’re patient w it, it will get unstuck if it becomes stuck - just give it a moment. Love that it is so much quieter than other brands... it’s comparable to a microwave in the background (you can definitely talk over it easily).
customer_reviews.author: W Sitka

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had this long but so far so good. Compared to my roomba 880 it is a lot quieter, you can still talk on the phone while it’s running. I also like that it has 2 sweepers - one on each side, the roomba only has one. This one doesn’t traverse the edges of rugs as good as the roomba, the roomba goes over everything I have, this one gets stuck or bumps them and turns away, but only on the higher ones - it does go on the low rugs. Overall I love this little machine. 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Coffeedrinkeranonymous

customer_reviews.title: 1 year and strong
customer_reviews.text: Had this guy a year now and still doing great. We have a 2000 sq house and use the magnetic strips to divide the house into thirds. He does well in any zone, capet or tile. It does need to recharge between each zone, which we expected. It cant pick up large oak leaves. Though didnt expect it to either. It picks up the rest fine. We leave it on the higher suction setting. Doesnt seem to pick up everything on tile without it. We have two large dogs and medium pile carpet... We call him Astro, and he is home. PS. We just bought the replacement parts kit for the brushes and filters. Its like he's back to new.
customer_reviews.author: Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!!
customer_reviews.text: This review is long overdue. I purchased this last December thinking it would be a gimmick like product. It really has exceeded our expectations. Now fast forward to 7 days shy of a full year and one of the outside brushes quit spinning. I called Eufy customer support and spoke with Christian. A new one is in the mail and he said I could keep the old one for parts. Not only a great product but fantastic customer service to back it up
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: No warranty support
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum but it stopped working a over a month ago and I have tried multiple avenues, calling, opening a support ticket, live chat and have received zero response or support on the one year warranty. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo Kyte

customer_reviews.title: Affectionately named it Dirty Hairy
customer_reviews.text: Robotic vacuums are life changing; get one! We have 2 large dogs and teenager grime and this little guy works great on our hard floors and onto our area rugs. Battery is sufficient to clean our entire house before needing to recharge (although we often close the bedroom doors and do them separately due to messy floors in teen rooms). Low profile so it gets under the bed/couch and the kitchen cabinet toe kick where the old Roomba would get stuck. Much quieter than Roomba too! Only owned this guy for a few weeks but I love it. Can’t yet effectively rate durability or battery life (longevity), but I will update my review if appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: RedToeNailPolish Mom

customer_reviews.title: 3 kids, 4 cats, new vinyl flooring
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing. I seriously never expected to love it as much as I do! It picks up EVERYTHING including dried bits of cat food, litter, hair, and the ridiculous mess my children make when they eat. We'd always had carpet so I was spending the time to sweep the floor and there was always dust, hair, and dirt left on the floor. I love that I can just turn it on and then go and doing something else. The pattern IS super random and my initial reaction was that there was no way it was going to get everything but I have been pleasantly surprised. I've been using it about a week now and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Karey

customer_reviews.title: Remote control
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it and it works great, but it goes all over the place.. Battery life is great, easy to use and clean.. NO direction when cleaning though... when I asked a friend who recommended this, I was told I can create the directional cleaning using the remote control, checked the box and I don't see a remote control.. SO is the remote control separate??
customer_reviews.author: Jaylin Uy

customer_reviews.title: poor little lost vacuum (with update for customer service)
customer_reviews.text: The suction power of this little robot is good, but it wandered aimlessly around my house, got repeatedly stuck, and had to be rescued several times each round. I have sent it back and am trying another. * update for customer service: Eufy has done everything in their power to ensure that I am a satisfied customer. Even though the vacuum did not meet my needs, their customer service department reached out to me quickly and made sure that I was not dissatisfied with the company, which I am not. I feel they are very responsive. As I continue my quest for the perfect robotic vacuum for our needs, I will definitely keep eufy in my sights.
customer_reviews.author: StephReeves

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum!! I used to have another brand for prefer this one much better. I love the strips that keep it from going down stairs. I will run it at night and the house is clean in the morning. Not only is the vacuum great but the customer service is exceptional!! I had a minor issue with the first one I bought and without hesitation they replaced it!! Very helpful and easy process!! Would definitely recommend not only because the product but also the customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: LizPost

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but don’t think it’s going to last.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this thing is pretty cool. It picks up dirt well, isn’t very loud, detects walls really well, cleans under beds and furniture, and works on many surfaces. It does have some areas where it falls short. It struggles going around reclining furniture, getting stuck under it or on the legs. It is also not great transitioning on to rugs, sometimes flipping the edge over. Ours has started making a grinding noise on one of the front brushes from running into stuff. I thought it would last longer than two weeks before the brush would stop working. You can hear it and see the brush stopping in my attached video.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Starts on its own.
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it just wanders from room to room without finishing... Eventually returning and getting most of it. But in a 3200 sq ft house it doesnt quite have the battery power to get it all done. I came to read reviews because mine keeps starting on its own. Probably every other day or every 2 days it just starts up without anyone near it. Does this happen to anyone else?
customer_reviews.author: Tina L Seymour

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ROBOVAC AND CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing because after owning 3 popular brand robovacs, this is by far the best one I've owned! It does a wonderful job and I like the magnetic boundary strips so much better. I unfortunately had an issue 3 months in and contacted customer support. After a quick conversation, I was requested to send vacuum back (they paid postage!) and I received new one within a couple of days after dropping at post office. I dealt with Evan in customer service who was polite, helpful, and very effective in resolving my problem. So refreshing to 1) deal with a person, 2) quick resolution of issue, 3) and friendly, helpful customer service!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago as a Christmas present for my son. It worked faithfully for 10 months then stopped leaving the charging base. The yellow light on the unit showed charging, but it had no power once it left the base. I called Eufy Help. They diagnosed the problem as a bad ON/OFF switch (I/O) and are sending me a new one in 3 days. Great service and good product when it works. I would buy the one with Alexa next time as it is pretty handy to give it commands: start cleaning, stop cleaning, return to base verbally.
customer_reviews.author: arncas

customer_reviews.title: Work even better than my old Eufy
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous Robovac that served for over a year before it ran over a wet dump and died when I cleaned it in the sink (my bad, honestly). The Robovac 30 was a small step up but seems to be better at knowing when it’s stuck and backing up. My old model got stuck on our kitchen floor divider and would just run in place to oblivion. Not this one! Update 08/2019 - has an issue where the Robovac suddenly got a lot louder during operation. Contacted support and they immediately issued a replacement roller that fixed the issue. Great support. Happy Eufy owner would suck again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Daily time saver! Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Eufy every single day for the past year or so. Overall it works excellent on my simpler rugs and my hardwood floors in my kitchen/living room. I had my first unit start making some noise after a period of 8 months or so, contacted customer service which was honestly one of the best customer service experiences I've ever had. They were trusting, speedy and followed up to make sure my replacement unit worked. Overall the unit is on par performance wise with similar competitors but Eufy's service put them a notch above in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Husky owner
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely amazing! I have a Siberian husky and a long haired cat and if anyone knows what it’s like to live with a husky in September or January-March or just 365 days a year, then you’ll understand! Now I don’t have to live in a snow storm! This thing runs once a day and has honestly changed my life. Sure I have to clean it every time it docks but that is a lot less effort than going around and vacuuming myself. So if you are someone who is looking for something that is going to pick up a lot of hair then this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Guensler

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little robot vac
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Eufy, and I love it! The only problem I have is with the magnets...I can't seem to get them to stick to the floor, but that is minor. I also tried a Samsung robot vacuum, but it didn't clean well and the battery was not strong. The Eufy's run for at least an hour and a half to two hours, plenty of time to clean the whole house. It is easy to clean, seldom gets stuck and is really reliable. I have pets so my Eufy runs every day, and does a really good job. I highly recommend Eufy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This RoboVac was easy to set up and program. I set it to work and it easily climbs over different carpets / rugs and has very powerful suction for such a small unit. It's remarkably quiet and runs for a long time before heading back to the charging station. It cleans very well and the dirt container was packed full when the floors were already pretty clean. This tells me it cleans deeply. I am pleasantly surprised at how well this works and the price just makes it an even better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best customer service and a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased the Robovac11. It started having problems at about a year, and Eufy promptly refunded my purchase price. (They even refunded my Amazon price for a replacement roller I had in stock!!) I immediately purchased the Robovac30 on the first day it was offered for sale. It has many subtle improvements. The Robovacs have done a stellar job of protecting our hardwood flooring investment. They take all the effort out of vacuuming. I am a stickler for maintenance and clean the filters and roller brush daily. I replace the filters and side brushes on a schedule. The boundary strips are a nice addition. Highly recommend the Robobac30.
customer_reviews.author: Tacenator

customer_reviews.title: 1st one was great, but then...
customer_reviews.text: I original loved this vacuum. It went through my first floor, vacuuming a lot of the dog hair. Then there was an issue with a wire which powered one of the wheels. This was covered by the warranty, and the entire unit was replaced. The new unit just never seems to perform the same as the original one I received. I’ve had this for months and I’ve never been satisfied with the amount it vacuums. It barely gets anything off the floor and I have to vacuum myself. Not sure the point in having it.
customer_reviews.author: Aerofool625

customer_reviews.title: A great vacuum from a company that cares!
customer_reviews.text: We had another brand of robotic vacuum that starts with an i before getting our eufy. That other brand vacuum never remembered where it’s base was so we returned it and got this one. We set it to run daily and it worked perfectly until last week when it began making a loud noise. I contacted Eufy and they got back to me right away. We did a few things they suggested to troubleshoot the issue and when that didn’t work, they immediately sent a replacement. I can’t say enough about how pleased I am with this vacuum and the excellent customer service this company provides. Don’t waste your money on more expensive brands. This one is better!
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the most part, a few small issues.
customer_reviews.text: The house looks great, it's so nice to outsource the work to a robo vac. It is very quiet, doesn't scratch furniture and finds stuff sometimes that I would never have located on my own. No problem returning to base and it's fun to watch while at work. Minor issues are it gets stuck between legs of dining chairs, does alright on floor lips (gets stuck for 30-40 seconds), and for some reason isn't that great on my kitchen floor (so I do a minute clean up behind it). On wood and carpet it's great. In summation, well worth the money especially when you consider the value of time!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Merck

customer_reviews.title: Returned vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We don’t like the random cleaning pattern. Because of the random cleaning pattern it did not clean the room entirely. Did not pick up well on carpeting. Battery life was sufficient. Filter worked appropriately. Side brushes became twisted and matted easily. Returned this Robovac and purchased another brand. Eufy contacted me and explained their product does not have mapping at this time. I believe this is a necessary function to compete with other robotic vacuums. They were very gracious and I will likely be a customer of Eufy/Anker products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: The best little helper
customer_reviews.text: This robot vacuum does exactly what we hoped: It keeps the tumbleweed hair balls from our very hairy doggo from gathering in the corners. I would say we still vacuum about once a month, but this is down from every 3-4 days before we had eufy. Our eufy started acting up about 9 months after getting it, and the bumper would get stuck. I reached out to eufy customer service, they sent a refurbished one that didn't end up working. But to correct their mistake, they sent us a brand new eufy that works like a charm. Really grateful for their customer service. Would buy again, though glad I didn't need to.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Shadrick

customer_reviews.title: It's a great assistant
customer_reviews.text: The RoboVac provides excellent cleaning of floors, including rug with varying height pile and carpeting. It's good on wood floors too but lint becomes airborne causing the vac to miss things. Customer service is excellent. The company replaced the remote control because of an issue with unexplained start-ups. The new remote has solved that. I still use a Dyson vac to dust furniture. I dust the RoboVac with that too. The RoboVac collects a lot of dust. I clean the RoboVac's dust collector and vacuum the filter after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Rieja

customer_reviews.title: works great, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than the old roombas I had. Recognizes the top of the stairs. Picks up a lot of stuff, has a decent sized bin but I do have to empty it frequently, we're kind of slobs and it is amazing how much lint this thing finds. Have to clean the rolling brush almost every time I empty the bin because hair gets wrapped around it. The magnetic strips are okay, I have to pin them down with furniture or books. Each strip gets about 2 pieces out of it; I measured the first two to fit areas then had like 4 inches left over so the second strip I just cut in half.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner works great! Every time I run it, it picks up a ton of dirt and hair (are we going bald?). It works better than I ever expected and it is very quiet also. And if you ever need to contact customer service, they are just wonderful! I contacted them by email for an issue, and they responded within a day or 2 and took care of the problem. It's not always easy to find a company that has such great customer service, as well as stands behind the product that they provide. I would recommend this vacuum to everyone I know! Thank you Eufy, you're great!
customer_reviews.author: SueBDoo

customer_reviews.title: BEST ROBOT VACUUM I HAVE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THS LITTLE VACUUM! I had a Roomba for about 3 years & thought it was doing a good job. NOT! This one has out cleaned the Roomba 100 times over. Of course, to be fair, I got a medium long haired cat a month ago this vacuum has worked it's heart out picking up all of the cat hair. Have to remember to clean the brush. Only draw back, wish it had a self cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We owned a Roomba about ten years ago and it always got stuck on things or in corners.... When I saw this was on sale, I figured I'd give it a shot, figuring that technology had advanced and improved. Really impressed with how much it picks up every night... And with the exception of when it goes into our office in the front of the house (with many corners and cords and music stands), it always manages to returnto the base. My wife used to vacuum the main floor every night - but now that job has been sourced out to a robot!
customer_reviews.author: A Job

customer_reviews.title: No more cat hair. Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how well Gufy works. After a few days of learning and getting cords etc. out of the way Gufu works quite well. We call it Gufy because it wanders about bumping into things seeming in random patterns. We have 3 cats and we always struggled keeping up with their hair everywhere. We set Gufy to start cleaning at 7:30 every day. It manages to keep the cat hair at bay; even around chair legs where it used to collect. The only regret I have about Gufy is I didn't get it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: My floors are so clean!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We've had this robot for about 3 or 4 weeks, my house has never been cleaner. We have 2 young boys, I anticipated small toys being a problem but it has helped us keep things picked up from off the floor. Even the kids are good at picking up because they don't want "Wolfy" to get hurt... I decided we needed a robot vacuum after our dog died, there were so many bits of food all over the floor I couldn't believe it! This thing is amazing. Haven't had a problem with it, the price definitely made it worth the risk of not going with a more well known, but expensive brand. Not missing the WI-FI
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love Eufy!
customer_reviews.text: We just love our Eufy! We have had it for seven months and Eufy does a great job. I didn't realize we had so much dirt! We have no pets and are two retired people, but there seems to be enough dirt to fill it every time. Eufy goes effortlessly from tile, to carpet, , to hardwood floors. Eufy has become a member of our family! I even talk to to him as he’s working. I watched u tubes about Eufy before my puchase and learned a lot. I am very happy that Eufy is in our home. A blessing! Susan
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with my Eufy
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with my eufy! I've had a couple different Roombas and couldn't be happier with my recent purchase. The eufy is MUCH quieter- it can be running and you hardly even know it is cleaning. With the Roomba - I would have to stop it to carry out a conversation. The battery life is better too and it always finds its way back home to charging base - something the Roomba struggled with. The motor seems strong and picks up a lot of dirt and debris. The remote control is very responsive and works great if you need a targeted/precision cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: P. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: LOUD no more..
customer_reviews.text: Company sent a new Eufy. Its blissfully quiet!!!! THANK YOU! My house has all wood flooring; 200 year old wood plank. I vacuum every day and run Eufy a few times a week to help with the dog hair shed by my four golden retrievers. Over all it does a swell job. But the noise is overwhelming LOUD. I clean it after every use removing hair from wheels too. I would not by a Eufy again. Update - the company is taking care of our problem with a very fast response. We have updated the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever cleans great quiet programmable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since day 1 and I cant say 1 bad word about this purchase. This machine cleans quietly you can watch tv and talk right next to it we also have it programmed overnight and we just empty the dustbin in the morning. It goes on easily on thinner rugs and medium thickness rugs too. My hardwood floor is not dusty any more and picks up all dog and human hair too. I wish I would have purchase this years ago but its never too late. The robot goes for 100 minutes and like its described goes back to the charger and recharges easily. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vivababe

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement over the 11 models
customer_reviews.text: The only docked star is for these boundary strips. They're kind of silly, a little hard to place reliably. The vacuum itself is a replacement for Eufy 11+, which was in turn a replacement for a 11s. The 30 blows those out of the water, not even comparable. Has reliably managed to complete its cleaning duties and find its way home, which the 11 models could hardly ever do. Also, I get that some vacuums have cable avoidance, which sounds nice, but its kind of cheeky for Eufy to not have that functionality, and instead give you cable ties.
customer_reviews.author: Adalberto N. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Sanity saver!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs, one who sheds like it's her job. We also have 2 kids. Both of whom may be entirely made of crumbs. Don't buy this with the expectation that it will pick up every single thing or the hope that it will replace your full size vacuum. It is such a sanity saver to not have to vacuum every day so the floors don't look so gross. I also feel a lot less guilty having our 6 month old roll around when the dog hair is under control. Buy it. Embrace our robot overlords. They'll clean for you.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn M.

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing...until it decided to stop working. Now it just beeps and nothing I do to correct via the troubleshooting works. First it beeped three times and was flashing red so I wiped the sensors like instructed by the manual. Then it started beeping two times with a solid red light. I pulled the side brushed off and put them on again and cleaned around them. Nothing. Still beeps. Won't work. I'm frustrated because this was great. Not sure if mine just malfunctions or what. Super bummer. And what do you know...about a week out from the return window.
customer_reviews.author: CSoegaard

customer_reviews.title: effortless cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's so quiet and doesn't irritate my husband like the upright did. Eufy's customer support is fantastic!! Our puppy chewed up the remote and with one call I was able to talk to a very nice, very helpful young lady that sent me a replacement right a way. I wish I could have gotten her name because she really knew what customer service means! Very happy with my purchase. It works best on hard surfaces. We have berber carpets and dogs that shed and it doesn't do as good a job of getting all the hair as my upright does on the carpeted surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: L Price

customer_reviews.title: A truly terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of our money. It arrived and we followed the instructions, letting it charge until the charge light turns blue. We followed the instructions exactly. Every time we try to start it, it beeps as if acknowledging the remote, then does nothing. Then the charge lights turns back to orange, as if it needs to charge, and we wait until it turns blue again and try. It has been that all evening. We just threw it away. It is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Utility Power Engineer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for my wife in order to take some of the load off of her daily routine in maintaining the house. She loves it! We were both a bit skeptical as to whether or not it would be worth it, but now we both agree that it has helped tremendously. It does very well on hard floor surfaces, and pretty well on carpet. It doesn't have quite the suction power of our upright vacuum but the fact that it just does its' own thing when it needs to has been great. It seems well built and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for shedding pets - less and less happy every day
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a while, but I get less and less happy with it every day. We have a golden retriever who sheds a lot, and while it does a pretty good job picking up the hair on hardwood, it also jams constantly. It's getting rare that it completes a cleaning cycle without me having to take it apart to clean the brush, the wheels, or the bumper. At this point, it happens often enough that I'm not sure I'm saving any time over just vacuuming myself.
customer_reviews.author: caerus

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: I thought robot vacuums were for lazy people, but eventually a couple friends talked me into getting one. I love this thing. It cleans up a huge amount of pet hair and the floors are so much cleaner now. Hair does tend to get tangled in the brush, but that is to be expected with any vacuum. You still need to runs regular vacuum now and then...but with 5 kids, 2 dogs and 2 cats we were vacuuming every day. Now we go a few days, or even a week between regular vacuuming. After about 6 months the Eufy started making a loud grinding noise, but replacement through customer service was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: AmberKnits

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1.5 years - Customer service NOT helpful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these 2018 and loved, so purchased another for another part of my house. They are *both* now not working. I called customer support. I was given a list of things to try to make them functional again, which were not helpful. I now have two black paper weights.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moses

customer_reviews.title: Best bang, reliability, and less fuss for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: After trying Roomba and many others that i returned (5 of them to be exact) I finally found the one that I know will get the job done! I have waited to post my review until the little thing won my heart. Since this model has the barrier strip that can be placed it works magically. The issue with the model prior was it getting stuck. With the barrier tape that solves the issue. This model is super easy to clean and unlike the Roomba I do not get constant alarms to clean every orfice. I will stick with this brand and have already purchased another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: AV8nMI

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, better product than expensive counterparts
customer_reviews.text: Ive had irobot roomba for a couple of years now. Eufy works better than irobot and costs much less. it is pretty quiet at the lowest suction speed. i think it does a good job of mapping the aread and not bumping into walls and obstructions. once it has identified a wall, it goes slowly and cleans up the edges. I live in multi level apartment and this thing does not fall of the stairs. overall a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Love my Eufy
customer_reviews.text: Took a week to train my dog to leave eufy alone. Trained daily. Now I turn on Eufy every evening when I get home from work. There is always dirt in the trap to clean out when Eufy is done. The floors look great. It works great on carpet, area rug, laminet and tile. Vacuums under hutch and dressers. Got stuck under recliner, so use magnetic strips to keep it from going there. No problem 👍 Very happy with this purchase. Have been using it for the past 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a little over a month now. I love how quiet it is I have a one bedroom apartment and it vacuums the whole thing on the run time. I have a mix of hardwood and carpet that has no problem navigating. It does not get stuck like my old Roomba. It also doesn’t keep feeding into the wall it’s much better about navigating around furniture. I find it to be a better device than what I had which was a Roomba 600 series
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Slusher

customer_reviews.title: Does the job if you don’t mind a lot of racket!
customer_reviews.text: The product does a really great job of cleaning up all the dust and dirt. At this point, I’m unable to use it while I’m in the house because it is so incredibly noisy. It’s so loud that my children cannot even talk to me without yelling. I’m not certain what changed, but it no longer glides smoothly on hardwood floors. It is quieter on carpet, but not enough for me to run it while I am in the home. I would not buy this product again. Do you research and make sure you get something that will not create such obnoxious noises!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Groff

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different, cheaper model
customer_reviews.text: Eufy robot vacuums are generally a great combination of quiet, low profile, and cheap. However, this particular model suffers from extremely poorly thought out design. The main draw of the 30 is supposed to be the magnetic boundary strips. However, the rotating bristles on the vacuum push the strips around before the vacuum gets to it, meaning their position is constantly jostled, and the vacuum often gets around them eventually, making them basically useless. The 11 series is great in rooms where you don't care where it ends up going. However, if you need to keep the vacuum out of certain areas this model will cause you nothing but stress and aggravation - don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Constantly needed babysat.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a Deebot, Shark and this Eufy. Deebot is the winner. While it’s great this is slim enough to clean under my couch, the side brushes don’t have enough clearance from the ground for the shortest pile mats and rugs. They swipe under them, thus pushing the mat up and getting stuck or turning around. The only plus compared to the other brands was the slim design. I guess if you have hard floors and all of your rugs taped down, this would work in your home.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY D THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love how quiet this is and how much it picks up. It is awesome if you follow the instructions and don’t expect miracles. It keeps the floors cat hair and dust free. Still need to swiffer weekly. UPDATE: 2 weeks later and I'm still absolutely amazed by this thing. You think your house is pretty clean until you get one of these. I have a cat and clean out a handful of dust/lint and cat hair from this little machine every single day. It really does pick up a heck of a lot of stuff. I cannot believe I lived without this before. It is incredibly how much dust and dirt accumulates in a single day.
customer_reviews.author: Johann D

customer_reviews.title: Love my new maid
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through several Roombas, none of which would transition from the hard wood floor onto thick rugs without getting stuck. Eufy, at a lower cost point, does this with ease. It not only catches my dog’s constant shedding hair, but it also goes back to its station when it’s done - something my Roombas only rarely. It’s a quiet workhorse that does its job without complaint. I can even see how well my cleaning ladies did by running the Eufy after they leave. I’m seriously impressed by the Eufy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning tool if used properly.
customer_reviews.text: Update: wonderful customer service!! Quick response to questions and concerns. Thank you so much Kayla for all of your help! I looooove my eufi! This was one of my baby shower gifts. It makes my life so much easier. I can set the schedule and it will start cleaning every morning before I even wake up. The only downside is you need to make sure you pick up any cables or objects that it may get stuck on or try to roll over. Every once in a while it will get stuck and I have a hard time finding it. If you use it properly it is a wonderful cleaning tool...Especially for moms!
customer_reviews.author: DaniHart

customer_reviews.title: simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I like the simple remote. No programming different buttons. Each button does its own job. You set the start time and the vacuum does its thing everyday. Goes under chairs, transitions from rug, to tile, to laminate easily. It will catch on long strings on area rugs or for me the shredded tail of a dog toy, but shorter strings it can probably pass over, SImple design and function. If you want to program different times for different days this is not it, but if you have a set time that works then this little guy will do its thing for about an hour and a half then put itself away.
customer_reviews.author: john peters

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: Look, its not going to deep clean your house but for daily running - a perfect little bot and much better value than the ones with apps. The remote works fine. I set up a schedule for when I'm at work and come home to no dust and the little guy back at home charging. Perfect. On weekends it goes upstairs to clean. It has never fallen down the stairs, and I made sure to watch the first time as I didn't believe it would work. Make sure you pick up cords etc. from the floor before firing it up. The robot is smart but not a genius :-)
customer_reviews.author: Some Art Guy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction vacuum and less noise. Perfect robo cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: An amazing device. It picked up things I didn’t know exist in my apartment. Very quiet compared to others and highly durable. Seriously, don’t look beyond this. Only thing they could add is to make it “smart” to control via app or Alexa Soni can control via phone/voice and command when not home. That being said, it comes with a remote that allows full functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Ajain

customer_reviews.title: Works but not great
customer_reviews.text: We are very disappointed in this vacuum. We had the Neato D80 before this one and it was great. We don't like the WiFi app features in most new robot vacuums. We tried this because we just want it on a schedule and forget about it. We also did not like the random pattern this vacuum takes. Neato does a back and forth grid which is great and predictable if you pets. Random patterns freaks our pets out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamsval

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Eufy Robovac. The first one lasted me about 2 years before it got so loud & clunky that I replaced it. I had this newer one about 4 months and it started getting loud and making random circles. I think one of the wheels stopped working. Eufy customer service was really good about answering questions and ultimately replacing it. Took about 2.5 weeks from inquiry to replacement. Overall I am happy with my vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie and Matt Bushak

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this little vacuum since I purchased it last summer. It is quiet, short enough to go under furniture/shelves, and does a good job picking up dust and pet hair. My floors are noticeably cleaner now. The unit usually finds its way back to the charger by itself. Occasionally I need to rescue it if it gets stuck under a chair, etc., but no biggie. A few weeks ago I realized I had accidentally lost the snap-in pre-filter as I was emptying the chamber. I contacted Eufy, they said they would send another filter for free. Lo and behold, they sent the entire dust chamber with all its parts. Needless to say I'm very happy. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Kane

customer_reviews.title: First class customer service
customer_reviews.text: Absolute 5 star company. Will really go the extra mile to make their clients satisfied. If you buy a robovac from Eufy, u will not regret the decision.
customer_reviews.author: Tunde Ayinla

customer_reviews.title: Not the Power of my Roomba
customer_reviews.text: I needed another robot vacuum and this one got such high reviews and it was cheaper than the Roomba. It is no doubt quieter and I love that you can guide it with the remote. It also finds its way back to the charger after being in several other rooms. But it isn't as good as my old Roomba of 5 years, in picking up dog hair and dust. It also has only one brush that gets filled up pretty quickly. I won't throw it away but I have banished it to areas with less traffic and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: SS in Montana

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research on different robot vacuums, we decided to go with the Eufy 30. So far I am very happy with the purchase. I have a cat and 2 dogs and we live out in the country a little so there was always dirt and pet hair on the floor no matter how often I vacuumed. I have noticed a big difference in running the Eufy one or two times a day! The brush does need to be cleaned pretty often with the pet hair, but besides that I can't think of any other issues!
customer_reviews.author: Christie J.

customer_reviews.title: After I bough the Eufy I don’t use my vacuum at all
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I started using this product for about a month and a half ago and I honesty consider it the best cleaning investment I have bough in a long time! I have a dog and I use the eufy everyday. It cleans my floor, my rug without any issue and it doesn’t get stuck at all. I give it a 9 out of 10 just for the fact that this one doesn’t have a phone app compatibility (I dont need the app and I wouldn’t use it anyway) I have it set up for automatic cleaning everyday at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: andres otero

customer_reviews.title: Vacuums very well.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about the robot vacs but decided to try one. This one (eufy BoostIQ RoboVac 30) had great reviews and was a much better price than others. I'm glad I choose it. It is quiet and picks up a lot of dog hair, which is what we hoped it would do. I was actually surprised how well it did. We only run it when we are present and don't use the boundary strips, so I can't comment on some of the features. But it quietly makes its way around the rooms and really vacuums great!
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Essentially non-functional after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mainly for weekly light vacuuming of pet hair. It worked relatively well at first, even though it takes very strange routes, perhaps because our small apartment has narrow hallways. However, after about 5 uses, the front bristles are horribly bent, and although they still sweep the pet hair, the vacuum simply does not pick up the hair at all. All it does now is gather the pet hair then roll over it, leaving a trail of flattened pet hair everywhere it goes. Very disappointing, especially because it worked for about 2 weeks at first.
customer_reviews.author: Teoso

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the wall doesn't work. If you want this vacuum, get the cheaper version without the strips.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good cleaning power, and VERY quiet. However, not worth the extra money for the blocking strips. My vacuum kept going right over them and pushing them back. I wasn't pleased... So I ended up getting a Roomba 690 for its virtual wall. UPDATE: I do have to say that Eufy has amazing customer service. They reached out and tried their best to solve my issue. I’d order from this company again just for that!
customer_reviews.author: chessmasterag

customer_reviews.title: Not a Roomba
customer_reviews.text: If you were looking for a vacuum robot that cleans in a solid pattern (like the Roomba), you will be sorely disappointed. This thing just travels whilly-nilly all around the place. Also, it runs out of battery after only cleaning my very small apartment living room. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: LoriLae

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim. I had a Roomba years ago, but that was before I had 2 dogs who shed and a child and boyfriend who are like Pigpen and have trails of dirt and dust that follow them around my house. While I’ve only had the product for a few days I LOVE IT. I have hardwood floors and low pile throw rugs. This little guy cruises over them and picks up everything. When he’s tired he goes back and charged himself up. My floors had so much dander and hair that I was vacuuming daily. This just cut it down to once a week. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Great robovac
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Eufy so far. This robovac exceeded my expectations. I don't sweep or vacuum anymore downstairs. Eufy does it & saves me time to clean elsewhere. I have tile and low pile carpet with rugs in my kitchen & by the front door. This machine cleans them all. The only bad thing is that my entertainment center bottom ledge is so close to the floor that it gets stuck sometimes. But I haven't tried the boundary strip on it yet. So that's my fault. The one I have tried works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm stunned by how much pet hair this robot collects each day. If you have a cat or dog that sheds, you need one of these and you need to run it every day! It's easy to use, easy to clean and it can be programmed to run at a certain time each day. The only oddity I have observed is that very occasionally the robot will set off to vacuum without being asked... But better that than it refusing to leave home base at all! Everything else is positive so far.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Patience

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how well this works
customer_reviews.text: This was our first robotic vacuum. We have five humans in our house and three cats, hardwood floors throughout. This little vacuum does a terrific job. I just love to watch it work. It's fascinating. It picks up hair and dirt as well as we expect it to. We haven't pulled out our old vacuum since getting this. My wife and I were saying this would be a great housewarming gift for anyone that doesn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very meh, especially for pets
customer_reviews.text: Pretty big disappointment. First of all, the runtime dropped dramatically to about the 30 minute range about 2 months after use. I bought the unit im August (Its February), and it runs for about 15 minutes and sputters out. Blinking red light. BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP (Indicating that the unit isnt charged). Except that its been on a charger for 2 days. The power button is supposed to glow blue when the unit is charged. Half the time it is perpetually blinking orange. Maybe I got a lemon but mine seems to have burned itself out quickly
customer_reviews.author: Damon H

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating navigation
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Eufy 30 about a year ago, and I don't know if I got a dud or what, but it almost always goes to the same side of the living room, vacuums there over and over, and even if I move it manually to the other side, it still usually returns right away to the side it "likes." It's very frustrating. I spend way more time "driving" it with the remote control than I would spend just running my upright myself. It does have good suction power and very convenient dust disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Salmon lover

customer_reviews.title: Superb suction and hits every spot more than once for a thorough clean.
customer_reviews.text: This vac pulls up more dust and dirt than the previous two vacs I tried. It has better suction and it shows. It beeps when it gets wrapped around a cord or stuck under furniture. I do wish the beeps were a little louder and they lasted longer, but it shuts down with a caution light if you don't find it in time. Plus it goes back to its charger when it gets tired. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great choice to alternatively overpriced options
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is easy to set up, they provide replacement brushes and a filter. I've used this now three times. I have a dog and a cat and was sick of vacuuming weekly. It picks up mostly everything but can leave a little bit of dog hair behind visible on the darker area rugs. However, it's good enough that I now don't need to vacuum weekly. I am super impressed with this machine. The only surprise was the battery life is shorter than expected, but it does clean the majority of the room before docking itself and I do run it on the highest suction level. I would definitely suggest to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Great Robo vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Our purchace of the new Eufy Robovac30 is a great replacement for our other robo vacuum, which is seen as the top brand. It's has more sucking power, much quieter, and when I had operating questions, the support staff was really cooperative! Made me reaffirm that I made the right purchase. Oh, did I mention the price is half the price of my original Robovacuum. So far every Anker and Eufy product I have purchased, I have not been disappointed with.
customer_reviews.author: Dacajun

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum!!! A little over a year ago I bought a Roomba 671 and have been very happy with it although it’s now starting to have some issues. Decided I needed a robot for the upstairs and took a chance on Eufy. So glad I did, I think it might be even better than the Roomba. Does a great job and it is definitely quieter than Roomba. Also, it has never fallen down the stairs. Now if they can please create a robot vacuum for stairs! One tiny thing I don’t like is having a remote control—I much prefer using an app like Roomba has. Who needs another remote lying around? Overall great product so far!!
customer_reviews.author: emily savoye

customer_reviews.title: Cliff jumper...
customer_reviews.text: I want to say I love it...and I do...except I'm no longer able to use it upstairs. It was working great, then one day it flew down the steps, denting the wall below. Thought it was a fluke, then happened again 15 min later when my three year old was walking down. Thankfully, it hit the cup out of her hand but not her. Dent number 2. One month in and I need to call customer service. I truly love it otherwise, but am pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I never knew what squalor we lived in until this
customer_reviews.text: Benson (our Eufy) is awesome. We have a 1920's home with original hardwoods, and he takes care of them. In the few carpeted areas, he does his job there just as well. The amount of filth that he picks up each time is amazing. The dust that accumulates that you don't even know is there- especially from the cat (I'll blame him)- is what Benson specializes in. Update: There was a problem with Benson, and the vendor couldn't have been any nicer or more expedient with taking care of the issue at no charge. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: The Lum

customer_reviews.title: The best thing!
customer_reviews.text: I put off buying one of these vacuums for about a year, and finally bought my self one, and it has been so nice not having to vacuum. This vacuum works great. We have mostly hardwood with rugs. It seems to do an equally great job on both surfaces. I used the magnetic strips around the Christmas tree, and that seemed to work just fine. The battery life is sufficient to get the job done. I do wish that it charged faster, but other than that minor thing, I have been very happy with my purchase. It fell down one stair only because the sensors were dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Zupan

customer_reviews.title: this is amazing! I own a dog and I have hardwood ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is amazing! I own a dog and I have hardwood floors with a few rugs around, so the floor gets really messy. Running the Robovac every once in a while really cleans up most if not all of the fur! Sometimes it gets stuck (on power cords under the entertainment center, on drapes, on threads sticking up from the carpet) but they're mostly my fault. It does get stuck on a lamp that I don't think it should, but I can just use the boundary strips for that. Customer service gave me some replacement brushes when it did get stuck though!
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I hated sweeping.
customer_reviews.text: We have two large dogs so hair accumulation occurs quickly on our tile floors. Sweeping is needed daily but who WANTS to sweep? Neither of us do. My better half was skeptical so I ordered it without her knowledge. She's very impressed with the job it does. Set a timer, it comes on daily and goes "home" when it's "tired". No complaints at all. Haven't used any mode other than the random cleaning mode but that gets everything for us. You can even control it if you notice something it didn't get to yet. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Impressed..so far! I am a past IRobot Roomba owner. So far ( only used it five times.) I like this Eufy much better. It's slimline gets under my furniture without getting stuck. It suction (on normal mode )is much better than Roomba. It has a stronger suction mode that I haven't needed to use yet. Roomba got stuck a lot. Eufy has not gotten stuck. Super quiet. I say so far because I'm worrying that it's too good to be true! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Giantsos

customer_reviews.title: Egh.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had some issues after just one month of use that the back wasn’t holding a charge. It didn’t work for about two weeks, then one night I tripped over it, and suddenly it started working again. Not sure what that was about, but it doesn’t seem like it will last a long time. I do not own any fur pets.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great robot vacuum, I haven't vacuumed the floors since I got it. I haven't had to sweep either but I run it every day. Great customer service I had an issue with mine but after asking for a video of the issue they sent me out a replacemet. I live with 4 girls and I have to clean the brush every day since hair gets wound up in it but I don't have a single regret about buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B

product_meta.title: eufy by Anker, BoostIQ RoboVac 30, Robot Vacuum Cleaner, Upgraded, Super-Thin, 1500Pa Suction, Boundary Strips Included, Quiet, Self-Charging Robotic Vacuum, Cleans Hard Floors to Medium-Pile Carpets
feature_bullets: Worry-Free Cleaning: Set Boundary Strips and the slim 2.85” body with an upgraded 1500Pa only cleans the areas you want.
BoostIQ Technology: Automatically increases suction power within 1.5 seconds when extra vacuuming strength is needed to get the best clean.
A Quiet Clean: A Quiet Clean: Vacuums for up to 100 minutes on hardwood floors with a consistent, powerful suction at a volume no louder than a microwave.

Premium Features: Anti-scratch tempered glass-top cover for protection, infrared-sensor for evading obstacles, and drop-sensing tech to avoid falls. Automatically recharges so it’s always ready to clean.

What You Get: RoboVac 30, 13 ft Boundary Strips, remote control (2 AAA batteries included), charging base, AC power adapter, cleaning tool, extra set of high-performance filters, 4 side brushes, 5 cable ties, welcome guide, and our worry-free 12-month warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,334 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
